item.title: Complete Edition Podcast: Episode 3 - Is There a Limit To Trophy/Achievement Hunting?
item.description: We have ran into some walls when trophy/achievement hunting and discussed why we continue to hunt! Tell us how you get passed blocks when trophy/achievement hunting.

item.title: Complete Edition Podcast: Episode 2 Resident Evil Retrospective and RE Village Spoiler Cast
item.description: AJ and I breakdown our past with Resident Evil and talk about the completion experience with Resident Evil 8 Village. Tell us about your experience with the completion in the comments. If you enjoy the show consider supporting us at patreon.com/completionclub.

item.title: Complete Edition Podcast Episode 1 Proudest Completions
item.description: We chose 5 games each we were most proud to complete. We discussed why we chose each game and a little bit about each game. Feel free to tell us your proudest completions in the comments. If you enjoy the show consider supporting us at patreon.com/completionclub.

item.title: Complete Edition Podcast Episode 0. Our Gaming History
item.description: This isn’t the normal structure of our show. We used episode 0 to build our chemistry and learn about our gaming past. If you like the show consider visiting our patreon at patreon.com/completionclub
